file_content.text: That's far enough! One more step and the girl dies.
Oh, you're in trouble now. Told you I had powerful friends.
The Jedi Council and I go way back. Nice to see you, Padawan.
I'm a Knight, actually.
I'm not a Padawan.
Sorry I missed your promotion ceremony. Been a little tied up.
I must have a twin I don't know about.
We've never met.
Don't tell me you've forgotten that party on Tython.
I wasn't just lobbing smoke grenades, you know.
It's a team effort.
Guess this makes us even for that time on Bespin, Colonel.
I have got to stop hanging out with Jedi. It's worse than being invisible.
Jedi always get the attention.
I see you brought your servant, Padawan. Good thinking.
Colonel. Is Battle Group Echo ready to level this place from orbit?
I'm afraid it's just us.
Not really, no.
I suppose we'll have to make do.
I wasn't aware you two knew each other, soldier.
I must have missed something.
Sure! Trained at the Academy together. I went special ops. The colonel went commando.
The fleet's standing by, weapons armed.
Uh, sure.
See? You people are done. Roll over and die, already.
If that trooper's a colonel, I'm a general.
This is ridiculous.
Salutations, sir. Didn't recognize you in disguise.
She may not look like much, but she's killed more men than all you Rist combined.
Hey, I look amazing. And I never killed anybody who wasn't asking for it.
Don't insult me.
See this guy? He's begging.
Behind that scruffy-looking exterior lies the most dangerous man in the galaxy.
Considering you two have never met, Captain, she has you all figured out.
That sounds about right.
And did I mention my friend travels with Jedi?
I've spent enough time with the captain to know that isn't true.
Looks are deceiving.
Ah, my old friend Master Sanctimonious. How's the Jedi business?
Nobody's more dangerous than the leader of Havoc Squad.
Oh, come on!
Prove it. I have just the target.
I prefer to think of myself as ruggedly handsome.
I'm not scruffy looking.
As long as you're still dangerous, why not?
You should've let me go when you had the chance. Now my friend will level this entire estate.
We just came here to free you.
This is only a rescue mission.
No reason you can't do both.
You have very high expectations of us.
That's an exaggeration.
You've never let me down before, Padawan.
Technically, I'm the only member of this team qualified for demolitions.
Hey, that's my job.
I was talking about you, Colonel.
And if that doesn't work, this girl might talk you to death.
You're funny.
If you surrender now, I'll go easy on you.
Has he hurt you?
I could use a bath, but otherwise I'm great. You?
You're crazy.
Hear that, you filthy assassin? It's a code phrase. Translation: You're doomed.
I don't care who you are. You invaded the sovereign territory of House Rist and murdered its people.
Release your captive, and you can live.
Give me the girl.
I don't bargain with scum!
That's a good thing, right?
By all the... you're as insane as she is!
And you're next.
Fool! You face a master assassin of House Rist.
Congratulations, idiot. You're about to die.
Not before I end your life. Guards!
